evidence.claim: Graham Company utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards in their health-related services.
Graham Company employs FHIR standards for health data exchange.
The company implements EDI (X12) transactions for operational efficiency.
Graham Company's engineering team is involved with API-first strategy for their platforms.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on API and EDI integrations for healthcare data exchange aligns with ICP criteria.
